Create your account

Date of birth

This will not be shown publicly. Confirm your own age, even if
this account is for a business, a pet, or something else.

Step 2 of 5

Customize your experience


Track where you see Twitter content across the web


Twitter uses this data to personalize your experience. This
web browsing history will never be stored with your name,
email, or phone number.


By signing up, you agree to our Terms, Privacy Policy, and
Cookie Use. Twitter may use your contact information, including
your email address and phone number for purposes outlined in
our Privacy Policy. Learn more
